issues.description: Problem statement refers to REST endpoints with prefix `/api` (e.g., “PUT /api/persons/{personId}/parents”), but both template and solution code register these endpoints at `/persons/...` without the `/api` prefix, causing students to be unable to map the described paths to the actual implementation.
issues.suggested_fix: Choose a single base path for the REST API across all artifacts. For example, add an `/api` prefix to the controller’s `@RequestMapping` (or remove `/api` from the problem statement) so that the endpoints truly match: `/api/persons/{personId}/parents`.
